explains: v. <正式>改善，改良，减轻；变得更好

sentences.en: Steps have been taken to ameliorate the situation.
sentences.cn: 已经采取措施以改善局面。

sentences.en: In every human being there is a wish to ameliorate his own condition.
sentences.cn: 改善自己境况的愿望人皆有之。

sentences.en: Should his condition ameliorate the sentence?
sentences.cn: 他的病情应该减轻刑罚吗？
